# Accessibility (A11y)

## Project Checklist

- [ ] Semantic HTML used correctly
- [ ] All interactive elements keyboard accessible
- [ ] Focus visible with 3:1 contrast
- [ ] Color contrast 4.5:1 for text, 3:1 for large text and UI components
- [ ] Images have alt text (decorative: `alt=""`)
- [ ] Forms have labels and error messages
- [ ] Dynamic content announced via `aria-live` regions
- [ ] Works at 200% zoom
- [ ] Respects `prefers-reduced-motion`
- [ ] Skip link to main content
- [ ] Modals trap focus and restore on close

## Testing

| Tool | Use |
|------|-----|
| axe DevTools | Automated scan |
| WAVE | Visual feedback overlay |
| Lighthouse | General audit score |
| VoiceOver (Mac) / NVDA (Win) | Screen reader testing |
| Keyboard only | Tab through entire interface |
| 200% zoom | Layout integrity |
